pullRequest.title: Add focusSourceColumnSeparator command
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #7436
This PR adds the focusSourceColumnSeparator command which is used to adjust the splitter position for the splitter to the right of the currently active column. It required a change to our forked gwt branch to have the splitter move in the correct directions. rstudio/gwt#5

commit.message: move splitter in correct direction for reverse panes

nodes.bodyText:
Add a menu access key to the menu label for Windows; there are so many similarly worded items on this submenu with almost the same words that no unique letters are available, so I recommend using "C", e.g. "Adjust Source _Column Splitter".
Did a scrub for others that are missing, and will fix via #7482
